doc: A subject who participates in an ORCATECH affiliated study
name: subject

fields.name: id
fields.doc: The ORCATECH unique identifier

fields.name: name
fields.doc: The subject's full name

fields.name: gender
fields.doc: The subject's gender

fields.name: dob
fields.doc: The subject's date of birth

fields.name: dod
fields.doc: The subject's date of death

fields.name: picture
fields.doc: A URI to download the subject's picture

fields.name: homes
fields.doc: A list of the homes the person currently resides in

fields.name: phones
fields.doc: A list of the person's personal cell phone numbers

fields.name: comments
fields.doc: A list of generic comments about the subject

fields.name: contacts
fields.doc: A list of contacts made with the subject

fields.name: studies
fields.doc: A list of studies this person is a member of

fields.name: issues
fields.doc: Issues raised about the subject. This can be due to the subject's wearable, health, etc.

fields.name: users
fields.doc: List of users responsible for this subject.

fields.name: projects
fields.doc: A list of projects this person is a member of

fields.name: items
fields.doc: A list of items in possession of this subject. Data generated by these sensors is considered to have been generated by this subject.

fields.name: identifiers
fields.doc: A list of external identifiers to match the subject to another database

fields.name: createdAt
fields.doc: When the record was created

fields.name: createdBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who created the record

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.doc: When the record was updated

fields.name: updatedBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who updated the record

fields.name: deletedAt
fields.doc: When the record was deleted

fields.name: deletedBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who deleted the record
